contentPart1.text:
Take the lifestyle test and see your impact on the environment.

It’s quick and easy!
contentPart1.title: Take the lifestyle test

contentPart2.text:
Get tailored suggestions for lifestyle choices.

The tips help you save time and money and improve your quality of life. And our planet will thank you!
contentPart2.title: Get tailored lifestyle tips

contentPart3.text:
Build your lifestyle plan and see the positive impact on the planet, and your life.

You can share your plan and invite friends and family to join. Everything is easier together!
contentPart3.title: Make your plan and start

contentPart4.text:
By using this app, you help us learn about sustainability. Your answers and choices feed into an anonymous data pool.

The data will help argue for necessary changes across society - moving us towards a positive and sustainable future.

All user data is fully anonymous, and individual responses cannot be linked with participants’ identity.
contentPart4.title: Your answers make a difference

intro: Is it possible to live sustainably and improve quality of life? Oh yes. The choices we make – how we live, eat and move – have a direct impact on the environment. Everything you can change, no matter how big or small, helps. Start your good life journey!
logotext: Your guide to a positive and sustainable life
